verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How lovely is Your dwelling place, oh Lord Almighty My soul longs and even faints for You For here my heart is satisfied, within Your presence I sing beneath the shadow of Your wings{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Better is one day in Your courts Better is one day in Your house Better is one day in Your courts Than thousands elsewhere{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My heart and flesh cry out, for You the living God Your spirit’s water for my soul I’ve tasted and I’ve seen, come once again to me I will draw near to You, I will draw near to You{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Better is one day in Your courts Better is one day in Your house Better is one day in Your courts Than thousands elsewhere{/lang-eng}
